When a distro is built the JSP files are bundled into a .WAR file. If you
w=
ish to modify the JSP files, you'll need to use Maven to generate your own
=
build of Heritrix (this should be relatively straight forward and is covere=
d
by the developers manual if I recall correctly). 
 
- Kris

 Message-----
